titles.title: RaD Fund Act of 2018
To establish a Rare Disease Therapeutics Corporation to encourage the development of high-risk, high-return therapies for rare diseases, and for other purposes.
RaD Fund Act of 2018
Rare Disease Fund Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Rare Disease Fund Act of 2018 or the RaD Fund Act of 2018
This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to organize the Rare Disease Therapeutics Corporation to purchase rights to, fund the development of, and sell ownership interests in drugs, biological products, and medical devices for rare diseases.
